#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define mod 1000000007
using namespace std;

int main() {
    int t;cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        string s1,ss;cin>>s1>>ss;
        vector<int> vec(26,0);
        //vec.resize(26);
        // for(int i=0;i<26;i++) vec[i]=0;
        for(int i=0;i<ss.length();i++) vec[int(ss[i]-'a')]++;
        set<int> sss;
        int count=0;
        for(int i=0;i<26;i++) {
            if(vec[i]) 
                sss.insert(vec[i]);
            count = count^vec[i];
        }
        if(count!=0){
            if(s1=="Tarun") cout<<"Tarun\n";
            else cout<<"Varun\n";
        }
        else{
            if(s1=="Tarun") cout<<"Varun\n";
            else cout<<"Tarun\n";
        }
    }
	return 0;
}
